cms3Components.name: layout
cms3Components.title: Layout
cms3Components.description: Layouts determine which modules are included on the page, and their size and placement.

cms3Components.name: style
cms3Components.title: Style
cms3Components.description: Styles use a selected Font and Color Palette to determine the look and feel of the modules and page in the chosen Layout.

cms3Components.name: font
cms3Components.title: Font Palette
cms3Components.description: Font Palettes determines which heading and body fonts are available for a Style to use, and normalize font heights for consistency.

cms3Components.name: color
cms3Components.title: Color Palette
cms3Components.description: Color Palettes provide a standardized, curated set of colors which the Style can use to color in the Layout.
